title: The American Amusement Park's Wild Ride
excerpt: From the trolley parks of the early 20th century to the theme parks of today, these spaces of shared pleasure have been both a reflection of urban life, and an escape from it.

title: Americaâ€™s favorite family outings are increasingly out of reach
excerpt: Taking the kids to a baseball game, a movie, or Disneyland is a bigger financial commitment than it used to be for middle-class families.
